cause.description:
If you believe that the Jews of Eretz Yisrael deserve the support that the government cannot provide.
Donations will be used to: Protect the roofs of schools & homes in Sderot - currently undefended from the constant flow of Qassam rockets from Gaza terrorists; Support new and developing communities, including those devastated by the recent war with Lebanon.
1. Jewish Israel citizens have the right to live without fear of terrorist attacks
2. Israel has a right to defend itself
3. Kol Yisrael Aravim ze le ze - All of Israel is responsible for one another
cause.mission: To support the Jews of the Land of Israel
cause.name: Am Yisrael Chai Fund
